# SYNAPSE Example Public Key

This is an EXAMPLE public key for demonstration purposes only.
DO NOT use in production.

## Format: Hex-encoded Ed25519 public key (32 bytes)

d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1f2a3b4c5d6e7f8a9b0c1d2e3f4a5b6c7d8e9f0a1b2c3d4e5

## Public Key ID (Fingerprint)

The public key ID is the first 16 characters of SHA-256(publicKey):

d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1

## Usage

Use this public key to verify signatures in the example-manifest.json.

## Important

⚠️ This is a TEST KEY for demonstration only.
⚠️ The corresponding private key is NOT provided.
⚠️ Real deployments must use properly generated keys.
